articles.title: Almost 500 new coronavirus cases across northern Lincolnshire confirmed over weekend - Grimsby Live
articles.description: North East Lincolnshire has surpassed the 4,000 mark
articles.content:
North East Lincolnshire has surpassed the 4,000 mark for coronavirus cases since the pandemic began. 
The staggering total of 4,096 comes despite two weeks of a second lockdown.
